name: Intelligence: Underwater Kingdom
description: Is a puzzle game in which you want to build an image (with the animals of the underwater Kingdom) so that the picture was like the original image. Move the tiles of the puzzle wisely to collect the correct order of the pieces of images.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP and newer Processor: Athlon 2 X3 450 Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce EN9600 GT Storage: 100 MB available space
